name: Ducati Challenge
description:
Get ready for breathtaking challenges and unique thrills riding official Ducati motorbikes (Monster 1100 EVO, Hypermotard 1100 EVO SP, Diavel Carbon, Multistrada 1200 S, Streetfighter S and Superbike 1198 SP) in a graphically stunning 3D racing game.

Wheelies, stoppies, overtaking, high speed and steering precision make Ducati Challenge a must-have game for Ducati and motorbike fans alike.

Fast race tracks, winding mountain roads, narrow medieval village streets, bustling metropolises and hot desert valleys will make the perfect locations for breathtaking challenges.

Game Modes:

1) CHAMPIONSHIP: 3 competitions of increasing difficulty and challenges.
2) QUICK CHALLENGE: pick your ride and track and just jump into the race.

The rich game Extras, including 25 unlockable achievements and 90 exclusive Ducati images, will be the icing on the cake for all Ducati and motorbike fans alike.



Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America.
